laboratory_examinations.findings: Hypoechoic mass, 2.4 cm x 1.5 cm, clear boundary, uniform internal echo, complete mucosal, submucosal, and serosal layers, no surrounding swollen lymph nodes.
Space-occupying lesions of gastric lesser curvature at the fundus of stomach, benign lesions of submucosal origin.
Tumor size 2.8 cm x 1.5 cm, low-differentiated carcinoma, infiltrating muscular layer, involvement of lateral incisal margin.
Erosion near the cardia, granulation tissue formation, inflammatory cell infiltration, fibrous tissue hyperplasia, residual lymphoepithelioma-like cancer, largest diameter of the tumor 0.9 cm.
